LanguageData.cider.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.cider.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.cider.label: Apple cider
LanguageData.cider.description: Shinzee's Apple Cider is a sweet alcohol from apples.
LanguageData.rum.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.rum.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.rum.label: Rum
LanguageData.rum.description: REinstein's Rum. Where's all the rum gone?
LanguageData.Wine.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.Wine.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.Wine.label: Wine
LanguageData.Wine.description: A sweet alcohol from grapes. From Ramsi's Private Reserves often stolen and smuggled.
LanguageData.strawberrywine.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.strawberrywine.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.strawberrywine.label: Berry Wine
LanguageData.strawberrywine.description: The artist Spoonshortage had two passions in life. Art and her love of Strawberry wine. So much so that she spent her vast wealth developing her own brand. It quickly spread across the Rim, as the best and only brand to drink. It is a sweet, pinkish alcohol from strawberries.
LanguageData.saki.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.saki.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.saki.label: Sake
LanguageData.saki.description: WHiZ Sake. A crisp, refreshing alcohol from rice.
LanguageData.vodka.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.vodka.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.vodka.label: Vodka
LanguageData.vodka.description: Syntria brand vodka is a clear, potato based alcohol. Created by the one of the Rim's most famous TV personalities.
LanguageData.tequila.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.tequila.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.tequila.label: Tequila
LanguageData.tequila.description: Kitty's Tequila is a potent liquor made of agave. It has a picture of what looks like a naked and inebriated female cat person on the bottle. Once discovered by a certain Orassan, she quickly perfected the recipe and it became a very popular drink on Orassia and developed an even more storied reputation.
LanguageData.whisky.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.whisky.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.whisky.label: Whisky
LanguageData.whisky.description: Quill's #18 whisky. Takes 18 years to age this drink to perfection. Tho cheap knockoffs have been made to add flavors to speed up the process. A golden, corn based alcohol.
LanguageData.BrownAle.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.BrownAle.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.BrownAle.label: Brown Ale
LanguageData.BrownAle.description: Barky's Brown Ale. A dark amber coloured beer. Made from barley grains.
LanguageData.Fruitshine.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.Fruitshine.tools.1.label: neck
LanguageData.Fruitshine.label: Fruitshine
LanguageData.Fruitshine.description: Fruitshine is a sweet alcohol from fruits. Based off of age old moonshining recipes.
LanguageData.CPD_CornWort.label: corn wort
LanguageData.CPD_CornWort.description: Wort made from corn. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable whiskey.
LanguageData.CPD_RiceMash.label: rice mash
LanguageData.CPD_RiceMash.description: Milled, soaked, and cooked rice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable saki.
LanguageData.CPD_VodkaPrecursor.label: undistilled vodka
LanguageData.CPD_VodkaPrecursor.description: Fermented vodka. This substance needs to be filtered and distilled at a brewery before it becomes drinkable vodka.
LanguageData.CPD_WineMust.label: berry wine must
LanguageData.CPD_WineMust.description: Pressed strawberry juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable strawberry wine.
LanguageData.VG_CaneMash.label: sugar cane mash
LanguageData.VG_CaneMash.description: Milled, soaked, and cooked sugar cane. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable rum.
LanguageData.VG_AmbrosiaMust.label: ambrosia must
LanguageData.VG_AmbrosiaMust.description: Pressed fruit juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable ambrosia.
LanguageData.VG_AgaveMust.label: agave must
LanguageData.VG_AgaveMust.description: Pressed agave juice. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable tequila.
LanguageData.VG_FruitMash.label: fruit mash
LanguageData.VG_FruitMash.description: Pressed and strained fruit juices. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable fruitshine.
LanguageData.VG_FruitKvassWort.label: fruit kvass wort
LanguageData.VG_FruitKvassWort.description: Prepare fruits and syrup into a wort for making a kvass drink. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable kvass.
LanguageData.Rawsugarcane.label: sugarcane
LanguageData.Rawsugarcane.description: Harvested canes from the sugarcane plant.
LanguageData.VG_AmbrosiaWine.label: ambrosia wine
LanguageData.VG_AmbrosiaWine.description: A sweet wine made from ambrosia.
LanguageData.CPD_Syrup.label: syrup
LanguageData.CPD_Syrup.description: A bottle of syrup made by reducing foods containing a large amount of sugar.
LanguageData.AppleSoda.label: apple soda
LanguageData.AppleSoda.description: A sweet soda made from apples.
LanguageData.BananaSoda.label: banana soda
LanguageData.BananaSoda.description: A slightly sweet soda made from bananas.
LanguageData.GrapeSoda.label: grape soda
LanguageData.GrapeSoda.description: A sweet soda made from grapes.
LanguageData.OrangeSoda.label: orange soda
LanguageData.OrangeSoda.description: A sweet and tangy soda made from oranges.
LanguageData.MangoSoda.label: mango soda
LanguageData.MangoSoda.description: A sweet and tangy soda made from mangoes.
LanguageData.PeachSoda.label: peach soda
LanguageData.PeachSoda.description: A sweet soda made from peaches.
LanguageData.PineappleSoda.label: pineapple soda
LanguageData.PineappleSoda.description: A sweet and sour soda made from pineapples.
LanguageData.BlueberrySoda.label: blueberry soda
LanguageData.BlueberrySoda.description: A sweet soda made from blueberries.
LanguageData.WatermelonSoda.label: watermelon soda
LanguageData.WatermelonSoda.description: A sweet soda made from watermelons.
LanguageData.CloudberrySoda.label: cloudberry soda
LanguageData.CloudberrySoda.description: A sweet soda made from cloudberries.
LanguageData.GooseberrySoda.label: gooseberry soda
LanguageData.GooseberrySoda.description: A sweet soda made from gooseberries.
LanguageData.KiwiSoda.label: kiwi soda
LanguageData.KiwiSoda.description: A sweet soda made from kiwis.
LanguageData.FigSoda.label: fig soda
LanguageData.FigSoda.description: A sweet soda made from figs.
LanguageData.DateSoda.label: date soda
LanguageData.DateSoda.description: A sweet soda made from dates.
LanguageData.CoconutSoda.label: coconut soda
LanguageData.CoconutSoda.description: A sweet soda made from coconuts.
LanguageData.CherrySoda.label: cherry soda
LanguageData.CherrySoda.description: A sweet soda made from cherries.
LanguageData.MysterySoda.label: mystery soda
LanguageData.MysterySoda.description: A sweet soda made from random fruit.
LanguageData.VegetableKvass.label: Beet Kvass
LanguageData.VegetableKvass.description: Kvass is a drink made from the natural fermentation of breads, such as wheat, rye, or barley, and sometimes flavoured using fruits, vegetables, and sugars.
LanguageData.KvassSoda.label: Kvass soda
LanguageData.KvassSoda.description: Kvass is a drink made from the natural fermentation of breads, such as wheat, rye, or barley, and sometimes flavoured using fruits, vegetables, and sugars.
LanguageData.FruitKvass.label: Fruit Kvass
LanguageData.FruitKvass.description: Kvass is a drink made from the natural fermentation of breads, such as wheat, rye, or barley, and sometimes flavoured using fruits, vegetables, and sugars.
LanguageData.VG_LargeFermentingBarrel.label: industrial fermenting barrel
LanguageData.VG_LargeFermentingBarrel.description: a fermenting barrel of industrial size for making larger amount of different types of alcohols.
LanguageData.CPD_DrinksTable.label: soda table
LanguageData.CPD_DrinksTable.description: A table for preparing and brewing a variety of beverages. Can work without electricity at 70% of normal speed.
LanguageData.Plantsugarcane.label: sugarcane plant
